sentences.english: But I AM cast on an island, where I see no wild beasts to hurt me, as I saw on the coast of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 在我所流落的孤島上，沒有我在非洲看到的那些猛獸。

sentences.english: In the construction of e_government, the phenomenon of "sef_governed information" is ubiquitous.
sentences.chinese: 當前電子政務建設中普遍存在“信息孤島”現象。

sentences.english: And this time, they finally found out how the doggies could survive on the isolated island.
sentences.chinese: 這一次，他們意外發現了小狗孤島生存的祕密。

sentences.english: They were condemned to spend a fortnight of idleness at that longly island.
sentences.chinese: 他們被迫在那個孤島上白白浪費了兩個星期。

sentences.english: The deployment of these systems, make enterprise run into the bemusement of "Information Isolated Island".
sentences.chinese: 這些系統的部署，使企業陷入了“信息孤島”的困惑。

sentences.english: Edward was drifted to an isolated island.
sentences.chinese: 山洪從山上流下來，愛德華被衝到一個孤島。

sentences.english: He usually dro in at my place on his way home.
sentences.chinese: 他常常在回家的路孤島餘生12金像上順便來看看我。

sentences.english: Back in 1969, Lanyu was a rather desolate place.
sentences.chinese: 蘭嶼島在當時是很荒涼的孤島。

sentences.english: Three years later, the People live on a lonely island of bump thread in the midst of a vast ocean of material prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 三年後，人們依然生活在水貼充斥翰海的貧困孤島上。

sentences.english: Systems will be isolated; data indecipherable; health-care quality unimproved .
sentences.chinese: 系統成“孤島”，數據不能識別，醫療質量無從改進。

sentences.english: She left me, it's no better than left me with an isolated island.
sentences.chinese: 她離開了我，這還不如把我一個人留在孤島上算了。

sentences.english: He was dying of boredom in the isolated island.
sentences.chinese: 他獨處於孤島之中覺得乏味得要死。

sentences.english: All my islands have sunk in the deep, so I can hardly relax or even oversleep.
sentences.chinese: 我的孤島深度淪陷，使我不能放鬆，甚至不能睡過頭。

sentences.english: Islands of redundant and inconsistent information arise.
sentences.chinese: 因此出現了冗餘和不一致的信息孤島。

sentences.english: Islanding conditions and damages of PV grid-connected power system were analyzed;
sentences.chinese: 分析了光伏併網發電系統的孤島效應現象。

definition: to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
(of family members) separated from one another/scattered about/dispersed/(math.) discrete
left to return to unchecked growth/overgrown/grown wild
